meanings.definition: A book or set of books containing articles on various topics, usually arranged in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: I found an encyclopaedia in the library to help me with my school project.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother gifted me a beautiful encyclopaedia for my birthday.
meanings.sent3: The encyclopaedia on dinosaurs made my little brother believe he could find a T-Rex in our backyard!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an encyclopaedia of random facts, always ready to impress with knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The encyclopaedia was like a treasure chest of information waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: A comprehensive reference work that provides information on all branches of knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The encyclopaedia on space exploration was fascinating to read.
meanings.sent2: Students often use an encyclopaedia to research different subjects for their assignments.
meanings.sent3: The encyclopaedia of jokes made everyone at the party burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom was an encyclopaedia, guiding us through life's complexities.
meanings.sent5: In her mind, the encyclopaedia of memories held the key to unlocking the past.
